mapcontrollers

类 MapEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapcontrollers.MapEditorController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MapEditorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Class acting as the MapEditorView's controller, to define action performed according to different users' action. It will use method getSelectedObj() to get user's selection from the view.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.lang.String lastUsedContinent 
      private MapEditorView myEditorView 
      private RiskMapModel myMapModel 
      private java.lang.String selectedName 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MapEditorController() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method to define action performed according to different users' action.
      void addModel(RiskMapModel m)
      Method to add a model to this controller.
      void addView(MapEditorView v)
      Method to add a view to this controller.
      private void changeContinentControl()
      Method to implement response to mChangeContinentControl menu, provide GUI to input new control number for a continent, then call mapelements.RiskMap#changeControlNum to really change a continent's control number.
      private void deleteContinent()
      Method to implement response to mDeleteContinentMenu, call mapelements.RiskMap#deleteContinent to really delete a continent.
      private void deleteCountry()
      Method to implement response to mDeleteCountryMenu, call mapelements.RiskMap#deleteCountry to really delete a country.
      private void loadFromFile()
      Method to implement response to loadFromFileBtn, provide GUI to input file's name, call mapelements.RiskMap#loadMapFile to load data into data structure, call checkErrors,checkWarnings to validate data, then refresh the main GUI.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method to startup the map editor.
      private void moveCountry()
      Method to implement response to mMoveCountry menu, provide GUI to choose a new continent for a country to move in, then call mapelements.RiskMap#moveCountry to really move the country.
      private void newContinent()
      Method to implement response to newContinentBtn, provide GUI to input new continent's name, then call mapelements.RiskMap#addContinent to really add a continent (controlNum initialize to 0).
      private void newCountry()
      Method to implement response to newCountryBtn, provide GUI to input new country's name and choose continent belongs to, then call mapelements.RiskMap#addCountry to really add a country.
      void newMap()
      Method to implement response to newMapBtn, create a new map object to edit.
      private void renameContinent()
      Method to implement response to mRenameContinentMenu, provide GUI to input new name for a continent, then call mapelements.RiskMap#renameContinent to really rename the continent.
      private void renameCountry()
      Method to implement response to mRenameCountry menu, provide GUI to input new name for a country, then call mapelements.RiskMap#renameCountry to really rename the country.
      private void saveToFile()
      Method to implement response to saveToFileBtn, check data validity, provide GUI to input file's name, then call mapelements.RiskMap#saveToFile to really save map to the file.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • addModel

        public void addModel(RiskMapModel m)
        Method to add a model to this controller.
        参数:
        m - model

      • addView

        public void addView(MapEditorView v)
        Method to add a view to this controller.
        参数:
        v - view

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Method to define action performed according to different users' action.
        指定者:
        actionPerformed 在接口中 java.awt.event.ActionListener
        参数:
        e - the action event of user.

      • newContinent

        private void newContinent()
        Method to implement response to newContinentBtn, provide GUI to input new continent's name, then call mapelements.RiskMap#addContinent to really add a continent (controlNum initialize to 0).
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.addContinent(String, int)

      • newCountry

        private void newCountry()
        Method to implement response to newCountryBtn, provide GUI to input new country's name and choose continent belongs to, then call mapelements.RiskMap#addCountry to really add a country.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.addCountry(String, String, int, int)

      • saveToFile

        private void saveToFile()
        Method to implement response to saveToFileBtn, check data validity, provide GUI to input file's name, then call mapelements.RiskMap#saveToFile to really save map to the file.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.saveToFile(String), RiskMapModel.checkErrors(), RiskMapModel.checkWarnings()

      • newMap

        public void newMap()
        Method to implement response to newMapBtn, create a new map object to edit.

      • loadFromFile

        private void loadFromFile()
        Method to implement response to loadFromFileBtn, provide GUI to input file's name, call mapelements.RiskMap#loadMapFile to load data into data structure, call checkErrors,checkWarnings to validate data, then refresh the main GUI.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.loadMapFile(String), RiskMapModel.checkErrors(), RiskMapModel.checkWarnings()

      • deleteContinent

        private void deleteContinent()
        Method to implement response to mDeleteContinentMenu, call mapelements.RiskMap#deleteContinent to really delete a continent.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.deleteContinent(String)

      • deleteCountry

        private void deleteCountry()
        Method to implement response to mDeleteCountryMenu, call mapelements.RiskMap#deleteCountry to really delete a country.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.deleteCountry(String)

      • renameContinent

        private void renameContinent()
        Method to implement response to mRenameContinentMenu, provide GUI to input new name for a continent, then call mapelements.RiskMap#renameContinent to really rename the continent.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.renameContinent(String, String)

      • changeContinentControl

        private void changeContinentControl()
        Method to implement response to mChangeContinentControl menu, provide GUI to input new control number for a continent, then call mapelements.RiskMap#changeControlNum to really change a continent's control number.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.changeControlNum(String, int)

      • renameCountry

        private void renameCountry()
        Method to implement response to mRenameCountry menu, provide GUI to input new name for a country, then call mapelements.RiskMap#renameCountry to really rename the country.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.renameCountry(String, String)

      • moveCountry

        private void moveCountry()
        Method to implement response to mMoveCountry menu, provide GUI to choose a new continent for a country to move in, then call mapelements.RiskMap#moveCountry to really move the country.
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.moveCountry(String, String)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to startup the map editor.
        参数:
